00013                 'man' => 'men',
00014                 'woman' => 'women',

00025         function pluralize($term)
00026         {
00027                 global $irregular_nouns;
00028                 
00029                 foreach ($irregular_nouns as $singular => $plural)
00030                 {
00031                         if (ends_with($term, $singular))
00032                         {
00033                                 return substr($term, 0, strlen($term) - strlen($singular)) .
00034                                         $plural;
00035                         }
00036                 }
00037                 if (array_key_exists($term, $irregular_nouns))
00038                 {
00039                         return $irregular_nouns[$term];
00040                 }
00041                 if (ends_with($term, 'child'))
00042                 {
00043                         // WARNING: NOT EXACTLY WHAT WANTED!!
00044                         return str_replace('child', 'children', $term);
00045                 }
00046                 if (ends_with($term, 's') ||
00047                         ends_with($term, 'x') ||
00048                         ends_with($term, 'o'))
00049                 {
00050                         return $term . 'es';
00051                 }
00052                 if (ends_with($term, 'y'))
00053                 {
00054                         return substr($term, 0, strlen($term) - 1) . 'ies';
00055                 }
00056                 return $term . 's';
00057         }
00058         
00059         function singularize($term)
00060         {
00061                 global $irregular_nouns;
00062                 
00063                 foreach ($irregular_nouns as $singular => $plural)
00064                 {
00065                         if (ends_with($term, $plural))
00066                         {
00067                                 return substr($term, 0, strlen($term) - strlen($plural)) .
00068                                         $singular;
00069                         }
00070                 }
00071                 if (in_array($term, $irregular_nouns))
00072                 {
00073                         return array_search($term, $irregular_nouns);
00074                 }
00075                 if (ends_with($term, 'xes') ||
00076                         ends_with($term, 'oes'))
00077                 {
00078                         return substr($term, 0, strlen($term) - 2);
00079                 }
00080                 if (ends_with($term, 'ies'))
00081                 {
00082                         return substr($term, 0, strlen($term) - 3) . 'y';
00083                 }
00084                 if (ends_with($term, 's'))
00085                 {
00086                         return substr($term, 0, strlen($term) - 1);
00087                 }
00088                 return $term;
00089         }
00090         
00091         function ends_with($term, $suffix)
00092         {
00093                 return strrpos($term, $suffix) === (strlen($term) - strlen($suffix));
00094         }
00095         
00096         function class_name_to_table_name($classname)
00097         {
00098                 return pluralize(camel_case_to_joined_lower($classname));
00099         }
00100         
00101         function table_name_to_class_name($tablename)
00102         {
00103                 return joined_lower_to_camel_case(singularize($tablename));
00104         }
00105         
00106         function joined_lower_to_camel_case($text)
00107         {
00108                 return preg_replace('/(^[a-z])|_([a-z])/e', 'strtoupper(\'$1$2\')', $text);
00109         }
00110         
00111         function camel_case_to_joined_lower($text)
00112         {
00113                 $text = preg_replace('/([A-Z])/', '_$1', $text);
00114                 $text = preg_replace('/^_/', '', $text);
00115                 return strtolower($text);
00116         }
00117         
00118         function class_name_to_foreign_key($classname)
00119         {
00120                 $fkey = preg_replace('/([A-Z])/', '_$1', $classname);
00121                 $fkey = preg_replace('/^_/', '', $fkey);
00122                 $fkey = strtolower($fkey);
00123                 $fkey .= "_id";
00124                 return $fkey;
00125         }
00126         
00127         function table_name_to_foreign_key($tablename)
00128         {
00129                 $fkey = singularize($tablename);
00130                 $fkey .= "_id";
00131                 return $fkey;
00132         }

00150         {
00151                 return addslashes($str);

00154         function limit_3($val, $a, $b)
00155         {
00156                 $min = min($a, $b);
00157                 $max = max($a, $b);
00158                 if (is_numeric($val))
00159                 {
00160                         if ($min <= $val)
00161                         {
00162                                 if ($val <= $max)
00163                                 {
00164                                         return $val;
00165                                 }
00166                                 return $max;
00167                         }
00168                         return $min;
00169                 }
00170                 return $min;
00171         }
